topicTitle: Hello, im Hamm. I would like to be unbanned?

posts.postText:
Hey, i was permabanned about a year ago and never found out why. Just curious if i could have a second chance, and/or find out why exactly i was permabanned, as it was so long ago i dont remember. Thanks!

Your In-Game name: Hamm
Your Steam ID:# 57 "Hamm" STEAM_0:0:15640451 00:17 78 3 active
Reason: Not sure
Length of Ban: Permanant
What server were you playing?:NNJG TTT
Who banned you?: Not sure, i think Ben.
Why should we unban you?: I would like a second chance at playing your servers as i see they are often very populated.
Is that your New Year's Resolution?
I guess? Idk, i just would like a second chance to play your servers cuz i see they are always populated and i would enjoy contributing to the community.
You were banned permanently by Mr. Gash for rdming. Since it has been a while, i think you do deserve a second chance. Let's hear what Gash says.
Like i said, its been almost a year and i would appreciate a second chance. Thanks!
No response? Really? Cmon guys, i just want a second chance. Don't stiff me like that.

If I had power (which i dont hehe), I would unban you (hehe i cant). Its reallly kinda funny how your still posting on here (seriously jokes), like I dont think we've seen any other important people (other than Kryzoid) make a reply to this. (Seriously LAWLS, thats some dedication i guess since your still trying to get unbanned).

:D
This is just awaiting Gash's response...
